org.springframework.web.servlet.theme

类 AbstractThemeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.theme.AbstractThemeResolver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ThemeResolver
    直接已知子类:
    FixedThemeResolver, SessionThemeResolver

    public abstract class AbstractThemeResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThemeResolver
    Abstract base class for ThemeResolver implementations. Provides support for a default theme name.
    从以下版本开始:
    17.06.2003
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller, Jean-Pierre Pawlak

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String ORIGINAL_DEFAULT_THEME_NAME
      Out-of-the-box value for the default theme name: "theme".
